name: Core Release 6.0
description: We are pleased to announce the release of new version of platform API version. The following list contains the enhancements and Bug fixes.

ADDED.text: RaaS custom fields in Js registration form added
Get fields of Userprofile API : added API signature to userprofile API section
Xing and Mail.ru social ID provider addded
New social login interface option added
New user profile fields addeds: GravatarImageUrl, ProfileImageUrls, WebProfiles
